Name: The Tale of Fighting Nymphs
About the game: I made this game for hobby by myself. This is animation style 3D fighting game included 8 + 1 characters. You can play with simple controls to use skills. You can play this game to easy. You enjoy story mode with single play, and versus mode with another player on off-line. You can use keyboards and game controllers. I only made main characters and BGM, another things was bought by Unity Asset Store. If my Japanese and Korean witch used in game was wrong, please teach me. And tell me your opinions of my game, please.
